name: Erdosnumberzero
body: I'm a software engineer working on image processing applications on the Kalray many-core processor. I primarily code in C POSIX, but have also done projects in OpenCL and using the Kalray Dataflow programming model. I organise the Paris Maker Girls meetup, which focuses on creating a community of women and girls interested in the Maker Movement. I organise workshops on electronics, Arduino projects, and soft circuits. I studied Electrical Engineering at UNSW, specialising in image and signal processing. In my free time, I like to sketch, watch arthouse films, travel, and hang out with my dog Pipotch. Check out my work on Github (transfer in progress!) or follow me on Twitter.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
